/usr/bin/g++       CMakeFiles/ZDAQ.dir/ZDAQ.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/ZDAQ -rdynamic ../lib/libCore.a -lusb-1.0 /opt/root_5.34/lib/libCore.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libCint.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libRIO.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libNet.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libHist.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libGraf.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libGraf3d.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libGpad.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libTree.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libRint.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libPostscript.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libMatrix.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libPhysics.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libMathCore.so /opt/root_5.34/lib/libThread.so -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/opt/root_5.34/lib
